figtree.panel
Class SimpleLabelPainter

java.lang.Object
  figtree.treeviewer.painters.AbstractPainter<T>
      figtree.treeviewer.painters.LabelPainter<jebl.evolution.graphs.Node>
          figtree.panel.SimpleLabelPainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Painter<jebl.evolution.graphs.Node>
public class SimpleLabelPainter
extends LabelPainter<jebl.evolution.graphs.Node>

A simple implementation of LabelPainter that can be used to display tip, node or branch labels. It can display, taxon names, branch lengths, node heights or other attributeNames of nodes.

Version:
$Id: BasicLabelPainter.java 773 2007-09-04 23:51:07Z rambaut $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut
